sen.j: 三室戸駅（みむろどえき）は、京都府宇治市菟道出口にある、京阪電気鉄道京阪宇治線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Todo-deguchi, Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture, Mimurodo Station is a stop on the Keihan Uji Line, which is operated by Keihan Electric Railway.
Mimurodo Station, located in Todo-deguchi, Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Keihan Uji Line, which is operated by Keihan Electric Railway.
Mimurodo Station, located in Todo-deguchi, Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Keihan Uji Line, which is operated by Keihan Electric Railway.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 島式1面2線のプラットホームを持つ地上駅である。
sen.e: It is located on the ground level, with an island platform serving two tracks.
It is located on the ground level, with an island platform serving two tracks.
It is located on the ground level, with an island platform serving two tracks.

sen.j: 改札口は1ヶ所のみで、ホーム宇治寄りにある。
sen.e: Only one entrance/exit gate place is located on the Uji side of the platform.
It has only one entrance/exit gate, located on the Uji side of the platform.
It has only ticket gate, located on the Uji side of the platform.
sen.cmt: 改札口→ticket gate としました。

sen.j: ホームの中程に待合室があり中書島寄りにトイレがある。
sen.e: A waiting room is located around the middle of the platform, and a lavatory on the Chushojima side of the platform.
A waiting room is located around the middle of the platform, and there is a lavatory on the Chushojima side of the platform.
A waiting room is located around the middle of the platform, and there is a lavatory on the Chushojima side of the platform.

sen.j: 駅員が一日中常駐している。
sen.e: The station is manned all day long.
The station is manned all day long.
The station is manned all day long.

sen.j: 終点・宇治駅までは、ここから電車で1分。
sen.e: It takes a minute from here to Uji Station that is a terminal.
It takes a minute from here to Uji Station, which is a terminal.
It takes a minute from here to Uji Station, which is a terminal.

sen.j: また、三室戸を出て、直ぐに宇治駅の駅舎とホームが見える。
sen.e: Immediately after a train departs from this station for Uji, the station house and platforms of Uji Station comes into sight.
Immediately after a train departs from this station for Uji, the station house and platforms of Uji Station come into view.
Immediately after a train departs from this station for Uji, the station house and platforms of Uji Station come into view.

sen.j: ※両ホームとも有効長は5両。
sen.e: * The platform length for each of the tracks is that for five-car trains.
* The platform length for each of the tracks is sufficient to accommodate a five-car train.
* The platform length for each of the tracks is sufficient to accommodate a five-car train.

sen.j: 番線表示はない。
sen.e: No track number is displayed.
No track number is displayed.
No track number is displayed.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 京阪電車宇治駅 - 本駅より南に約400m。
sen.e: Uji Station of Keihan Electric Railway - approx. 400 m south of this station
Uji Station of Keihan Electric Railway is approximately 400 meters south of this station.
Uji Station of Keihan Electric Railway is approximately 400 meters south of this station.

sen.j: 三室戸寺
sen.e: 三室戸寺=>Miruroto-ji Temple
三室戸寺=>Miruroto-ji Temple
Mimuroto-ji Temple

sen.j: 宇治菟道郵便局
sen.e: The Uji Todo post office
The Uji Todo post office
The Uji Todo post office

sen.j: 1917年（大正6年）2月1日 開業。
sen.e: February 1, 1917, 1910: Its operation started.
February 1, 1917: The station came into operation.
February 1, 1917: The station came into operation.

sen.j: 1943年（昭和18年）10月1日 会社合併により京阪神急行電鉄（阪急電鉄）の駅となる。
sen.e: October 1, 1943: The companies concerned merged and this station became a station of Keihanshin-kyuko-dentetsu (Hankyu Corporation).
October 1, 1943: The companies concerned merged, and this station became a facility of Keihanshin-kyuko-dentetsu (Hankyu Corporation).
October 1, 1943: The companies concerned merged, and this station became a facility of Keihanshin Express Electric Railway (Hankyu Corporation).
sen.cmt: 京阪神急行電鉄→Keihanshin Express Electric Railway としました。

sen.j: 1943年（昭和18年）11月1日 一旦廃止。
sen.e: November 1, 1943: Its operation was once discontinued.
November 1, 1943: Its operation was discontinued.
November 1, 1943: Its operation was discontinued.

sen.j: 1947年（昭和22年）4月1日 再び開業。
sen.e: April 1, 1947, Its operation restarted.
April 1, 1947: Its began operating again.
April 1, 1947: Its began operating again.

sen.j: 1949年（昭和24年）12月1日 会社分離により京阪電気鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: December 1, 1949: Due to a separation of the company, this station became a station of Keihan Electric Railway.
December 1, 1949: Due to a separation of the company, this station became a facility of Keihan Electric Railway.
December 1, 1949: Due to a separation of the company, this station became a facility of Keihan Electric Railway.

sen.j: 2000年（平成12年）6月26日 待合室冷房化。
sen.e: June 26, 2000: An airconditioner was introduced in the wating room.
June 26, 2000: An air conditioner was installed in the waiting room.
June 26, 2000: An air conditioner was installed in the waiting room.

sen.j: 1999年6月の休日には京阪宇治線宇治快速の停車駅になった事があった。
sen.e: On the holidays of June, 1999, Uji rapid trains on the Keihan Uji Line stopped at this station.
During the holidays of June 1999, Uji rapid trains on the Keihan Uji Line stopped at this station.
During the holidays of June 1999, Uji rapid trains on the Keihan Uji Line stopped at this station.

sen.j: これは三室戸寺がアジサイの名所であることによる。
sen.e: This was because Miruroto-ji Temple famous for hydrangea blossom was located nearby.
This was because of the station's close proximity to Miruroto-ji Temple, which is famous for hydrangea blossoms.
This was because of the station's close proximity to Mimuroto-ji Temple, which is famous for hydrangea blossoms.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。
